content.question: Monopolies are inefficient compared to perfectly competitive firms because monopolies

choices.label: produce output with average total cost exceeding average revenue
produce more output than is social desirable
charge a price less than marginal revenue
charge a price greater than marginal cost
charge a price less than average total cost

content.answer: charge a price greater than marginal cost

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe the similarities, differences, and limitations of economic concepts, principles, or models.
